body: Humans born near the sea are always drawn to it. They gain a +2 racial bonus on Profession (sailor) and Swim checks, and these are always class skills for them. They can hold their breath twice as long as normal, and spellcasters gain a +4 racial bonus on concentration checks when attempting to cast spells underwater. This racial trait replaces skilled.
name: Heart of the Sea
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Heart of the Sea
